rules_text: Burrowing | While Root Spider is burrowed, minions directly above it are disabled.

name: Roots of Yggdrasil
type_text: A Unique Site and earthbound cradle
rules_text: When the Roots of Yggdrasil are destroyed, destroy everything.

name: Royal Bodyguard
type_text: An Elite Mortal of steadfast loyalty
rules_text: If a nearby Avatar or royalty (King, Queen, Prince, or Princess) would take damage, Royal Bodyguard may take that damage instead.

name: Ruby Core
type_text: A Unique Relic of inflamed efficacy
rules_text: Provides (F) and ① to its controller.

name: Ruins
type_text: An Exceptional Site of Fire and Air
flavour_text: What do lines on a map mean to the sand and the sun and the wind?

name: Ruler of Thul
type_text: A Unique Mortal of hibernal majesty
rules_text: Charge  | Allies can move as if the top and bottom edges of the realm were connected. Other allies occupying sites there have +1 power.

name: Rustic Village
type_text: An Ordinary Site of fertility
rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

name: Sacred Scarabs
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with an explosive finale
rules_text: Airborne | Deathrite → Deal 3 damage to each unit here.
flavour_text: It’s all fun and games until someone steps on a bug.

name: Salmon of Knowledge
type_text: An Elite Beast offers elusive insight
rules_text: Submerge, Waterbound | Other units at this site have "Tap → Roll a d20. On a 14+, banish Salmon of Knowledge and draw three spells."

name: Sand Worm
type_text: An Ordinary Beast swims seas of sand
rules_text: Burrowing, Landbound
flavour_text: Only a soft susurration betrays the passing of these desert leviathans far beneath your feet.

name: Sandstorm
type_text: An Ordinary Aura of swirling silica
rules_text: Affected sites and units atop them can't be attacked or intercepted. | At the start of your turn, dispel Sandstorm.

name: Saracen Raiders
type_text: Exceptional Mortals exploit the flanks
rules_text: Charge  | May be cast to any site without enemies.

name: Saracen Scout
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal scans the horizon
rules_text: May be cast to any site without enemies.
flavour_text: We arrive swifter than destiny’s decree, Riding early and light, harbingers are we. Pale Kings of Albion, beware!

name: Scarecrow
type_text: A gaunt and ragged Ordinary Relic
rules_text: Genesis → Return each Airborne minion here to its owner’s hand. | Airborne minions can't enter this location.

name: Scavenging Fiend
type_text: An Exceptional Demon rummages refuse
rules_text: Genesis → Conjure a broken artifact to this location.

name: Scent Hounds
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with extraordinary sniffers
rules_text: Nearby enemies permanently lose Stealth.
flavour_text: For the upwardly mobile of the Midland Court, accolades in the Royal Hunt of the Mist were as treasured as any war-time achievement.

name: Scorched Earth
type_text: Elite Magic of dire desperation
rules_text: Choose any number of sites you control. Destroy each of those sites and everything there.

name: Scourge Zombies
type_text: Ordinary Undead of recent vintage
rules_text: Whenever an allied Mortal dies on land, you may summon Scourge Zombies from your cemetery to its location, tapped.

name: Screaming Skull
type_text: An Elite Relic of unbridled rage
rules_text: Whenever bearer attacks and kills an enemy, it untaps.

name: Sea Raider
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal loots and pillages
rules_text: Whenever Sea Raider attacks and kills an enemy, its controller discards their topmost spell. You may cast that spell once this turn, ignoring threshold.

name: Sea Serpent
type_text: An Ordinary Beast bestrides the ocean
rules_text: Submerge, Waterbound
flavour_text: The study of sea serpents advances one funeral at a time.

name: Seasoned Sellsword
type_text: An Elite Mortal serves the highest bidder
rules_text: Avatars nearby have "Discard a card → Gain control of Seasoned Sellsword."

name: Secret Tunnel
type_text: An Exceptional Site of subterranean passage
rules_text: Burrowed allies can move as if this were adjacent to your other sites.

name: Sedge Crabs
type_text: Ordinary Beasts that scrape and sidle
rules_text: Can only move themselves sideways.
flavour_text: “One will never make the crab walk straight.“ — Aristophanes

name: Seelie Court
type_text: A benevolent forum of the Faerie Elite
rules_text: At the start of your turn, players draw a spell for each Faerie in the realm.
flavour_text: From faeborn folk, this tribute bespoke.

name: Seer
type_text: Your Avatar prognosticates success
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | At the start of your turn, look at your topmost site or spell. You may put it on the bottom of its deck.

name: Seirawan Hydra
type_text: An Elite Monster of multifarious might
rules_text: Immune to non-lethal damage.
flavour_text: Fell the tree, and the branches are soon cut off. — Francis Quarles

name: Selfsame Simulacrum
type_text: An Elite Faerie of sincerest flattery
rules_text: May be summoned as a basic copy of a nearby minion.
flavour_text: Common folk view their lives through a half-silvered mirror, seeing only their own reflection.

name: Seven-League Boots
type_text: Unique Armor for traipsing and japesing
rules_text: Bearer has Movement +7.
flavour_text: “Bring me my boots at once, so that I may catch them!“ — Charles Perrault

name: Shameless Squire
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal takes any advantage
rules_text: Lance | Genesis → Tap target nearby enemy. It drops everything it's carrying.

name: Shapeshift
type_text: Elite Magic of capricious change
rules_text: An allied minion tries to transform. Look at your next five spells: you may choose a minion among them to be the new form. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.

name: Shatter Strike
type_text: Exceptional Magic to sunder defenses
rules_text: An ally targets an enemy adjacent to them, destroying an artifact they're carrying and then striking them.

name: Shellycoat
type_text: An Ordinary Faerie of noisome hide
rules_text: Submerge | Takes 1 less damage.
flavour_text: "Shelly-coat! Shelly-coat! Away to yer home! I seek not yer mercy, nor fear I yer name."

name: Sherwood Huntress
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal who lives off the land
rules_text: Ranged
flavour_text: “[They] passed into eclipse, Her kiss upon their lips— Even Belphoebe’s, whom they gave their lives for!” —Kipling, The Queen’s Men

name: Shield Maidens
type_text: Exceptional Mortals hold the line
rules_text: Nearby allies take 1 less damage.
flavour_text: My word is my bond, my shield is my service.

name: Shield Wall
type_text: Exceptional Magic of unfaltering formation
rules_text: Until your next turn, each ally takes 1 less damage for each other ally it's nearby.

name: Shifting Sands
type_text: An Exceptional Site of unsettled animosity
rules_text: Genesis → Reactivate the Genesis abilities of your nearby Deserts.

name: Shrink
type_text: Exceptional Magic of brief diminution
rules_text: Set the base power of target nearby unit to 0 until your next turn.

name: Siege Ballista
type_text: An Exceptional Weapon and engine of war
rules_text: Tap bearer and another ally here → Deal 3 damage to target unit up to two steps away.

name: Siege Giant
type_text: An Exceptional Giant takes aim
rules_text: Once on your turn, Siege Giant may throw a weaker ally here through the air to a nearby location.

name: Silence
type_text: An Elite Aura of simpler times
rules_text: Minions occupying affected sites lose all non-basic abilities.

name: Silver Valkyries
type_text: Elite Angels hold constant vigil
rules_text: Airborne | At the end of your turn, untap all allies here.

name: Simple Village
type_text: An Ordinary Site of fecundity
rules_text: Genesis → You may pay ① to summon a Foot Soldier token here.

name: Sinkhole
type_text: An Elite Site of impending collapse
rules_text: Sacrifice Sinkhole → Destroy a nearby site.

name: Sir Agravaine
type_text: A Unique Mortal seeks strength in numbers
rules_text: Stealth, Movement +1 | Whenever another ally attacks an enemy adjacent to Sir Agravaine, he strikes that enemy afterwards without losing Stealth.

name: Sir Balin
type_text: A Unique Mortal delivers a dolorous stroke
rules_text: Lance | Whenever Sir Balin strikes an Avatar, destroy that Avatar's site then burrow other minions and artifacts there.

name: Sir Bedivere
type_text: A Unique Mortal and bearer of precious things
rules_text: If Sir Bedivere is carrying an artifact at the start of your turn, draw a card.

name: Sir Bors the Younger
type_text: A Unique Mortal and accomplished hunter
rules_text: Ranged 2 | Enemies lose Stealth.

name: Sir Gaheris
type_text: A Unique Mortal, ever vigilant
rules_text: Lance | Untaps at the end of your turn.

name: Sir Galahad
type_text: A Unique Mortal with an unshakable faith
rules_text: Sir Galahad's strikes heal you. | Nearby allies take no damage from Demons, Spirits, and Undead.

name: Sir Gareth
type_text: A Unique Mortal disguised as a commoner
rules_text: (A)(W) — Reveal from hand → Transform an allied Mortal into Sir Gareth.

name: Sir Gawain
type_text: A Unique Mortal devoted to his duty
rules_text: Sir Gawain takes damage for other adjacent allies. If he dies from damage taken this way, draw a card.

name: Sir Ironside
type_text: A Unique Mortal with the strength of seven men
rules_text: Has +3 power during enemy turns.
flavour_text: “Then Sir Ironside waxed wroth and doubled his strokes, and hurt Beaumains wonderly sore, that the blood ran down to the ground.” —Malory, le Morte D’Arthur

name: Sir Kay
type_text: A Unique Mortal that punches down
rules_text: Whenever Sir Kay targets a weaker minion, he untaps.
flavour_text: “Anon Sir Kay ran unto the fifth king, and smote him so hard on the helm that the stroke clave the helm and head to the earth.” — Malory, le Morte D’Arthur

name: Sir Lamorak
type_text: This Unique Mortal's death will be avenged!
rules_text: Deathrite → Strike each nearby enemy.
flavour_text: “And they lashed all at once to Sir Lamorak, but anon at two strokes Sir Lamorak had slain two of them, and the other two fled.” — Malory, le Morte D’Arthur

name: Sir Lancelot
type_text: A Unique Mortal fights in the queen's name
rules_text: Lance | The first time Sir Lancelot fights each turn, untap him.

name: Sir Mordred
type_text: A Unique Mortal and pretender to the throne
rules_text: Genesis & Deathrite → Kill target adjacent enemy minion.

name: Sir Morien
type_text: A Unique Mortal strikes arrows in flight
rules_text: Genesis → Summon two Foot Soldier tokens here. | Enemy projectiles can't enter here.

name: Sir Pelleas
type_text: A Unique Mortal transformed by Faerie love
rules_text: Submerge | Moves freely between water locations.

name: Sir Pellinore
type_text: A Unique Mortal, always on the hunt
rules_text: Charge, Lance | Whenever Sir Pellinore kills the strongest enemy minion, draw a card.

name: Sir Perceval
type_text: A Unique Mortal, destined for adventure
rules_text: Genesis → An opponent chooses a site. | When Sir Perceval enters that site, draw a card, then reactivate his Genesis ability.

name: Sir Priamus
type_text: A Unique Mortal of healing and harm
rules_text: Lance, Lethal | Nearby allies are immune to Lethal.

name: Sir Tom Thumb
type_text: A Unique Faerie makes a lucky escape
rules_text: May be carried by any Beast. | Deathrite → Return to hand.

name: Sir Tristan
type_text: A dashing Mortal of Unique charisma
rules_text: Once on your turn, Sir Tristan may tap target nearby enemy minion. That enemy doesn't untap the next time it would.
flavour_text: “Tristan cast great love to Iseult, and there he learned her to harp, and she began to have a great fantasy unto him.” —Malory, le Morte D’Arthur

name: Sir Yvain
type_text: A Unique Mortal with a bestial bond
rules_text: Lance. Genesis → Choose an allied Beast. | Sir Yvain and his Beast companion have +2 power while adjacent to each other.

name: Sirian Templar
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal dispenses almighty justice
rules_text: Takes no damage from Demon, Spirit, or Undead minions.
flavour_text: Struck down, the templar rose again, guided by his holy purpose—and the dawn rose with him.

name: Sirocco Scorpions
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with deathly stings
rules_text: Lethal
flavour_text: Tread light! And hasten thee away from skittering cinders, sun-scorched obsidian shards asway.

name: Sisters of Avalon
type_text: Exceptional Mortals who shape the future
rules_text: Spellcaster | Genesis → Discard a spell. Draw a spell.

name: Sisters of Silence
type_text: Elite Mortals not to be disturbed
rules_text: Other nearby minions lose all non-basic abilities.
flavour_text: “Since long I’ve held silence as a remedy for harm.” — Aeschylus

name: Skirmishers of Mu
type_text: Exceptional Mortals harry from horseback
rules_text: Ranged | During basic movement, Skirmishers of Mu may perform a ranged strike from any location along their path.

name: Sky Baron
type_text: An Elite Spirit and welkin overlord
rules_text: Airborne | All other minions lose Airborne.

name: Sleep
type_text: Ordinary Magic of soporific slumber
rules_text: Target minion at a location up to two steps away falls asleep. It's disabled until it takes damage.
flavour_text: Breathe deep the gathering bloom.

name: Sling Pixies
type_text: Exceptional Faeries flitter hither and thither
rules_text: Airborne, Ranged | Takes no damage from units with 4 or more power.

name: Slumbering Giantess
type_text: An Exceptional Giant dozes peacefully
rules_text: Genesis → Fall asleep. Slumbering Giantess is disabled until hurt.

name: Sly Fox
type_text: An Ordinary Beast slips from sight
rules_text: Gains Stealth at the end of your turn.
flavour_text: “Then the old man got up in his cap, And swore he would catch the fox in a trap; But the fox was too cunning, and gave him the slip, And ran through the town, the town, e-ho!”

name: Smokestacks of Gnaak
type_text: A Unique Site of industrialized evil
rules_text: Other nearby sites lose their abilities.

name: Sneak Thief
type_text: An Elite Mortal burgles and borrows
rules_text: Stealth | Tap → Steal an artifact out of the hands of another target unit here, and stay Stealthed.

name: Snow Leopard
type_text: An Ordinary Beast prowls powdry peaks
flavour_text: “This is the Le-o-pard, my child, His temper’s anything but mild.” ― A. M. Shaw & C. Beckwith

name: Snowball
type_text: Exceptional Magic picks up speed
rules_text: Shoot a piercing projectile. It picks up all other units along its path and carries them with it. When it stops, units there take damage equal to the number of units in the snowball.

name: Sorcerer
type_text: Your Avatar to assert your dominance
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | Tap → Draw a spell.

name: Sparkmage
type_text: Your Avatar's enemies are in for a shock!
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | Tap → Target nearby location. Deal damage to another random unit there equal to the sum of (A) on spells you've cast this turn.

name: Spear of Destiny
type_text: A Unique Weapon of divine retribution
rules_text: Bearer has “Tap → Throw Spear of Destiny at any minion anywhere. It teleports to that minion’s location and kills it.”
flavour_text: Nor mortal's blood shall sate a hunger erst whetted by divine.

name: Spearmarshal
type_text: An Elite rider rallies Mortals to his side
rules_text: Once on your turn, Spearmarshal may acquire a Lance token.

name: Spectral Stalker
type_text: An Ordinary Undead roams betwixt the between
rules_text: Voidwalk
flavour_text: “We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.” ― H. P. Lovecraft

name: Spellslinger
type_text: Your Avatar drafts the winning agenda
rules_text: Start the game with 4 spells in hand. | Tap → Play or draw a site.

name: Spin Attack
type_text: Ordinary Magic of radial violence
rules_text: An ally strikes each enemy at its location.

name: Spire
type_text: An Ordinary Site bitten by violent weather
rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Spires.

name: Spire Lich
type_text: An Exceptional Undead towers above
rules_text: If Spire Lich is atop a Tower, it has +2 power, Ranged, and Spellcaster.

name: Spring River
type_text: An Ordinary Site of rejuvenation
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

name: Squeakers
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with room to grow
rules_text: Deathrite → Reveal your next five spells, then summon all Pigs of the Sounder from among them to this site. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.

name: Squirming Mass
type_text: Elite Beasts wriggle and writhe
rules_text: Whenever a nearby minion dies, Squirming Mass permanently gains its power.

name: Standing Stones
type_text: An Elite Site where leylines converge
rules_text: Minions here are Spellcasters.

name: Star-seeds of Uhr
type_text: Unique Magic mourns a long lost past
rules_text: Fill up to thirteen voids with Rubble.
flavour_text: For each layer of ruin excavated, another calamity of yore was revealed.

name: Steppe
type_text: An Exceptional Site of Earth and Fire
flavour_text: There's beauty in the simplicity of empty horizons.

name: Stone Rain
type_text: Exceptional Magic pelts down from above
rules_text: Target a site up to two steps away. Deal 1 damage to everything atop it, repeating for each site in your hand.

name: Stone-gaze Gorgons
type_text: Elite Monsters gaze longingly from afar
rules_text: Other minions at rest at adjacent locations are disabled.
flavour_text: In the gleam of his unblooded sword, Veslin unwittingly beheld a sight no mortal had yet lived to unsee.

name: Stormy Seas
type_text: Exceptional Magic of maritime furor
rules_text: Submerge all minions and artifacts occupying target water site.
flavour_text: The sea is angry today, my friends; hike and hold, men, fly! Bring due astern Neptune's belly!

name: Stream
type_text: An Ordinary Site imbued with boundless life
rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Streams.

name: Sugarplum Pixies
type_text: Exceptional Faeries distilling elixir
rules_text: Airborne | At the end of your turn, untap another nearby ally.

name: Summer River
type_text: An Ordinary Site of renewal
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

name: Summoning Sphere
type_text: An Exceptional Aura ushers in a dark era
rules_text: You may summon minions to affected sites.
flavour_text: The icy earth swung blind and blackening in the moonless air. Morn came and went—and came, and brought no day. — Lord Byron

name: Sunken Treasure
type_text: Exceptional Relics lost at sea
rules_text: If cast, conjure this under an allied water site of an opponent's choice. | When Sunken Treasure is carried to the surface, its controller sacrifices it and draws two cards.

name: Swamp Buffalo
type_text: An Ordinary Beast of ponderous proportions
flavour_text: Impassive, plump, and peaceful, the swamp buffalo is an icon of contentment.

name: Swan Maidens
type_text: Ordinary Mortals of eerie grace
rules_text: Airborne, Submerge
flavour_text: Before woman was, the water awaited her.

name: Swindler Troupe
type_text: Ordinary Mortals practice misdirection
rules_text: Genesis → Give another nearby allied minion Stealth.
flavour_text: “Oh, noble guard, I could really use your help... over there.”

name: Swiven Scout
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal keeps her distance
rules_text: Movement +1 | Enemy Avatars within Swiven Scout's range of motion play with their hands revealed.
flavour_text: "Know thine enemy and know thyself, and feel not the awe of a hundred battles." — Sun Tzu

name: Sword and Shield
type_text: Exceptional pairing of Weapon and Armor
rules_text: Bearer has +2 power.
flavour_text: A shield wards off and a sword strikes down; both indispensable to uphold a knight’s oath.

name: Sylvan Splendor
type_text: An Elite Aura unites the forest folk
rules_text: Whenever you cast a Beast or Faerie to an affected site, draw a spell. Dispel if an affected site is successfully attacked.

name: Tactical Move
type_text: Ordinary Magic to reposition your troops
rules_text: One at a time, each ally takes up to two steps.

name: Tadpole Pool
type_text: A Unique Site and nursery for nuisance
rules_text: (W)(W)(W) — Genesis → Summon three submerged Frog tokens here.

name: Tax Collector
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal demands his due
rules_text: Genesis → On your opponent's next turn, their spells cost (1) more.

name: Telekinesis
type_text: Exceptional Magic of psychic swiping
rules_text: Caster snatches and picks up target nearby artifact they can carry.
flavour_text: “If it’s in my hand, it’s mine.” — Toddler’s first rule.

name: Teleport
type_text: Ordinary Magic of abrupt relocation
rules_text: Teleport an ally to the surface of target site.
flavour_text: “There was no real sense of time passing, and in the last act it felt like everyone was just teleporting everywhere.“ — Highland Theater Critic

name: Templar
type_text: Your Avatar upholds an oath to prevail
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | The first Knight, Sir, or Dame you cast each turn costs (1) less.

name: Thankless Squire
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal works harder than most
rules_text: Lance, Lance, Lance, Immobile

name: The Black Plague
type_text: A Unique Aura of insidious disease
rules_text: At the end of your turn, the weakest minion occupying affected sites dies. If tied, choose one. Dispel if none die.

name: The Colour Out of Space
type_text: A Unique non-Euclidean Site
rules_text: Provides no mana or threshold if not adjacent to the void.

name: The Faerie Queene
type_text: A Unique Faerie orchestrates her underlings
rules_text: Airborne, Spellcaster | Nearby allied Faeries take no damage from units with 4 or more power.

name: The Geistwood
type_text: A Unique Site of denied absolution
rules_text: Genesis abilities here are also Deathrite abilities.

name: The Great Drowning of Men
type_text: A Unique Aura of inevitable erosion
rules_text: At the start of your turn, destroy affected sites and flood the resulting Rubble. Submerge everything atop them and dispel The Great Drowning of Men.

name: The Great Famine
type_text: A Unique Aura runs the storehouse dry
rules_text: At the end of your turn, the strongest minion occupying affected sites dies. If tied, choose one. Dispel if none die.

name: The Green Knight
type_text: A Unique Mortal taunts and retorts
rules_text: Whenever an enemy minion can attack The Green Knight, it must. | Deathrite → Strike target nearby enemy.

name: The Immortal Throne
type_text: A Unique Monument to life everlasting
rules_text: Whenever anyone plays a card with cost equal to the number of level counters on The Immortal Throne, they draw a card and add a level counter. | At level 8 or more, an Avatar here alone wins the game.

name: The Lady of the Lake
type_text: A Unique Mortal guides others to glory
rules_text: Spellcaster, Submerge | Genesis → You may summon a Mortal or artifact from your cemetery to Lady of the Lake's location. If you do, shuffle her into her owner's spellbook.

name: The Ninth Legion
type_text: A Unique formation of Spirits unsettled
rules_text: Voidwalk. Must be cast to a corner. | Deathrite → Return to hand.

name: The Round Table
type_text: Gather as equals at this Unique Monument
rules_text: Must be cast to your back row. | Whenever you summon King Arthur, or a Knight, Sir, or Dame to The Round Table, draw a card.

name: The Wild Hunt
type_text: Spirits and Faeries lead this Elite procession
rules_text: Airborne | Other nearby Spirits and Faeries have Charge.

name: Thieving Magpie
type_text: An Ordinary Beast collecting shinies
rules_text: Airborne | May pick up carried artifacts with cost (1) or less.

name: Thundering Giant
type_text: An Elite Giant of rumbling impact
rules_text: Charge | Once on your turn, Thundering Giant may teleport to another nearby location. Tap all other units there on arrival.

name: Thunderstorm
type_text: An Exceptional Aura of tempestuous fury
rules_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random unit atop affected sites, then you may move Thunderstorm one step. | Lasts 3 of your turns.

name: Tide Naiads
type_text: Exceptional Spirits crash into shore
rules_text: Submerge | This site is flooded. It is a water site.

name: Tintagel
type_text: A Unique Site of seaside sanctuary
rules_text: Only provides mana and threshold while in your back row.

name: Tithe
type_text: Unique Magic collects more than its fair share
rules_text: Draw three sites.

name: Tooth Faeries
type_text: Exceptional Faeries extract payment
rules_text: Airborne | At the start of your turn, tap target nearby enemy.

name: Torshammar Trinket
type_text: An Exceptional Relic of recurring force
rules_text: Bearer has +1 power. | At the end of your turn, return this to its owner’s hand.

name: Tournament Grounds
type_text: An Exceptional Site to settle the score
rules_text: Anyone may cast Knights, Sirs, or Dames to this site and may do so for no threshold.

name: Town
type_text: A Site bursting with Exceptional talent
rules_text: Exceptional minions cost (1) less to cast to this site.

name: Tragedy Worrywart
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal prepares for the worst
rules_text: Units nearby take no damage from Magic spells.
flavour_text: He frets incessantly to preserve the life he's not living.

name: Treetop Hideout
type_text: An Ordinary Site to stay unseen
rules_text: Genesis → You may give Stealth to a nearby allied minion.

name: Tringh Constrictor
type_text: An Exceptional Beast with a crushing embrace
rules_text: Tap → Tringh Constrictor may take a step, then it constricts target minion here and carries it disabled. The next time Tringh Constrictor would untap, it instead kills that minion if it's still constricted.

name: Troll Bridge
type_text: An Exceptional Site to traipse atop
rules_text: The first time a lone enemy enters here each turn, strike it unless they discard a card.

name: Truesight Crossbow
type_text: An Exceptional Weapon with an all-seeing eye
rules_text: Bearer has Ranged and can target Stealth units.

name: Tufted Turtles
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with plated pelt
rules_text: The first time Tuft Turtles would take damage each turn, prevent that damage.
flavour_text: A turtle is never without a castle—or a coffin.

name: Tvinnax Berserker
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal lusts for blood
rules_text: Whenever Tvinnax Berserker can attack a unit, he must. | Untap Tvinnax Berserker whenever he attacks and kills an enemy minion.
flavour_text: Most folk share naught with berserkers save for being, and even that not for long.

name: Twist of Fate
type_text: Unique Magic to reverse one's fortunes
rules_text: Exchange life totals with target opponent. (X) is the difference between your life totals.

name: Ultimate Horror
type_text: A Unique Spirit of unhallowed eve
rules_text: Airborne, Voidwalk | Genesis → Summon each other dead Voidwalk minion to a nearby site or void.

name: Undertaker Engine
type_text: An Elite Automaton of mechanic cryptopsy
rules_text: At the end of your turn, you may burrow and/or unburrow any combination of artifacts and minions at this site.

name: Undertow
type_text: An Exceptional Site of strong undercurrents
rules_text: Genesis → Staying within this body of water, move target unit one step.

name: Unland Angler
type_text: An Elite Beast lurks and lures
rules_text: Submerge | At the start of your turn, if Unland Angler is submerged, force each enemy minion atop adjacent sites to take a step toward this one.

name: Unland Eel
type_text: An Exceptional Beast whelms the unwary
rules_text: Submerge | Whenever Unland Eel submerges, it may drag another minion here down with it.

name: Unlikely Alliance
type_text: Elite Magic forges a strange coalition
rules_text: Draw a card for each rarity among allied minions.
flavour_text: There are three rules for winning a war. Unfortunately, nobody knows what they are.

name: Unravel
type_text: Ordinary Magic of calm repose
rules_text: Destroy all artifacts and Undead minions at a location up to two steps away.
flavour_text: “My heart, why come you here alone? The wild thing of my heart is grown, to be a thing, fairy, and wild, and fair, and whole.” — G. P. T. Branwen

name: Unseelie Court
type_text: A malevolent forum of the Faerie Elite
rules_text: At the start of your turn, players discard a spell for each Faerie in the realm.
flavour_text: From far and thence we give no thanks, only offense.

name: Updraft Ridge
type_text: An Exceptional Site of singing tailwinds
rules_text: Airborne minions atop Updraft Ridge have Movement +1.

name: Upwelling
type_text: Exceptional Magic of fluid undoing
rules_text: Target a nearby site. Return each artifact and minion there to its owner's hand.
flavour_text: There is no height to which confident fools cannot ascend.

name: Valley
type_text: An Ordinary Site embraced by gentle hills
rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Valleys.

name: Valley of Delight
type_text: An Elite Site for the footloose and fancy-free
rules_text: Genesis → Choose one: (A), (E), (F), (W). This site provides that permanently.

name: Valor
type_text: Elite Magic of fearless defense
rules_text: May be cast when an ally defends a site or another unit. The ally gains +4 power this turn.

name: Vanguard Knights
type_text: Exceptional Mortals ride onward to glory
rules_text: Vanguard Knights have +2 power if they alone are the furthest forward of your units.

name: Vanishment
type_text: Exceptional Magic leaves no trace
rules_text: Give all allied minions Stealth. Draw a spell.
flavour_text: “He is the marvellest knight that is now living, for he destroyeth many good knights, for he goeth invisible.” — Malory, le Morte D’Arthur

name: Vantage Hills
type_text: An Exceptional Site with striking views
rules_text: Ranged units atop this site have +1 range.

name: Varmint Warrens
type_text: An Elite Site of subterranean safety
rules_text: Beasts here can't be targeted by enemies.

name: Vaults of Zul
type_text: A Unique Site of beguiling riches
rules_text: The first time an Avatar stops here, they draw three cards and skip their next turn.

name: Vengeful Heir
type_text: An Elite Mortal out for blood
rules_text: As an additional cost to cast this, you may banish a dead Knight, Sir, or Dame. If you do, Vengeful Heir is summoned as a copy of that minion.

name: Verdant Knight
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal swears an honest vow
rules_text: Lance
flavour_text: Clad in nature’s splendor, the knight journeyed onwards with the might and grace of chivalric conviction.

name: Vesuvius
type_text: A Unique Site of doom foretold
rules_text: (F)(F)(F) — Sacrifice Vesuvius → Each unit occupying nearby sites takes 3 damage.

name: Vikings
type_text: Ordinary Mortals appear to sack and burn
rules_text: Tap → Deal 2 damage to each unit at target adjacent location.
flavour_text: “Pagans have desecrated God’s sanctuary, shed the blood of saints around the altar, laid waste the house of our hope and trampled the bodies of saints like dung in the streets.” —Alcuin, 793AD

name: Vile Imp
type_text: An Ordinary firestarter of a Demon
rules_text: Genesis → May deal 2 damage to target adjacent unit.
flavour_text: One good burn deserves another.

type_text: A Unique Mortal surpasses her mentors
rules_text: Vivien has the printed abilities of all Avatars and Spellcasters in the realm, wherever she is.

name: Vril Revenant
type_text: An Elite Spirit of overcharged existence
rules_text: Voidwalk | ① → Gain +1 power this turn.

name: Wall of Air
type_text: An Ordinary Aura of bitter obstruction
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. | Minions with Airborne or 2 or less power can't traverse Wall of Air.

name: Wall of Brambles
type_text: An Ordinary Aura and barbed barricade
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of an allied site. | Whenever an enemy traverses this wall  | on the ground, it takes 2 damage.

name: Wall of Fire
type_text: An Ordinary Aura and blazing barricade
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. | Whenever a unit passes through Wall of Fire, it takes 3 damage.

name: Wall of Ice
type_text: An Ordinary Aura of impassable ice
rules_text: Conjure atop the border of a site you control. | Units can't traverse Wall of Ice on the ground.

name: War Horse
type_text: An Exceptional thoroughbred Beast
rules_text: Charge, May carry an ally.
flavour_text: “Bretherne, ye ought to be ashamed to falle so off your horsis! What is a knyght but whan he is on horsebacke?”

name: Warp Spasm
type_text: Unique Magic of hyper-violence
rules_text: This turn, double an allied minion's power, and whenever it attacks and kills a unit, it untaps. At the end of the turn, it dies.

name: Wasteland
type_text: An Ordinary Site ravaged by terrible rage
rules_text: Your atlas may include any number of Wastelands.

name: Watchtower
type_text: An Exceptional Site safeguards the horizon
rules_text: Enemy units atop nearby sites permanently lose Stealth.

name: Waveshaper
type_text: Your Avatar of ebb and flow
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | Tap → Flood a site near your body of water until you do so again. Tap minions without submerge there. They don't untap the next time they would.

name: Wayfaring Pilgrim
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal on a spiritual journey
rules_text: Whenever Wayfaring Pilgrim enters each corner of the realm for the first time, you may draw a card.

name: Waypoint Portal
type_text: Exceptional Magic of dimensional distortion
rules_text: Choose two different sites. This turn, units can move between them as if they were adjacent.

name: Wedding Hall
type_text: An Elite Site of joyful union and eternal vows
rules_text: Provides no mana, but if Arthur and Guinevere start your turn here, you win.

name: Weightless Squire
type_text: An Ordinary Mortal carried by Faerie optimism
rules_text: Airborne, Lance

name: Whirling Blades
type_text: A vicious vortex of Exceptional Magic
rules_text: An ally may take up to two steps, and then strikes each enemy along their entire path.

name: Whirlwind
type_text: Exceptional Magic of encircling winds
rules_text: Choose clockwise or counterclockwise. Each unit and artifact atop sites in a two-by-two area is pushed one step in that direction.

name: White Hart
type_text: A Unique Beast and quarry of kings
rules_text: Other minions and locations nearby can't be attacked.

name: White Knight
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal defends the weak
rules_text: Costs (2) less to cast if you have less life than each opponent.

name: Wicked Witch
type_text: An Elite Mortal with a forlorn flock
rules_text: Spellcaster | Other nearby minions have -2 power.
flavour_text: What sense in hoping for death, with nothing left to die for?

name: Wicker Manikin
type_text: An Ordinary sprig of an Automaton
rules_text: Non-fire Spellcaster
flavour_text: By twisted frame round willow's heart, let none disclaim my turner's art.

name: Wild Boars
type_text: Ordinary Beasts with brindled bristles
flavour_text: Twere once again drowsy, when all in a rush, wild boar came a-snuffling, straight out of the brush!

name: Wildfire
type_text: An Exceptional Aura of itinerant ignition
rules_text: Conjure Wildfire atop a single site nearby. | At the end of each turn, each unit here takes 3 damage, then move Wildfire to an adjacent location it hasn't visited before. If none remain, dispel Wildfire.

name: Wills-o'-the-Wisp
type_text: Exceptional Spirits of fascination and folly
rules_text: Voidwalk | Whenever Wills-o’-the-Wisp are attacked, they may teleport to another nearby location or void to evade the attack.

name: Wind Sylph
type_text: An Exceptional Spirit of capricious casting
rules_text: Airborne, Air Spellcaster | After Wind Sylph casts a Magic spell, she may push a unit here one step.

name: Windblast
type_text: Exceptional Magic of weighty weather
rules_text: Push everything atop sites one step in a cardinal direction.

name: Windmill
type_text: An Exceptional Site of Earth and Air
flavour_text: The wind's wild words, in uncertain surges, whisper how the world was made.

name: Wings of Invention
type_text: An Exceptional Device of aerial ingenuity
rules_text: Bearer has Airborne and Movement +1, if it's a minion.

name: Winter River
type_text: An Ordinary Site of cold crisp recovery
rules_text: Genesis → Look at your next spell. You may put it on the bottom of your spellbook.

name: Witch
type_text: Your Avatar's curses are inescapable
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. | Tap → Curse target Avatar, choose one: Their spells cost (1) more to cast on their next turn, they lose 2 life, or they have -3 power until your next turn.

name: Witherwing Hero
type_text: A Unique Angel, dauntless and daring
rules_text: Airborne | Whenever a weaker allied minion here is attacked, you may return it to its owner's hand.

name: Wizard's Den
type_text: An Elite Site for undisturbed study
rules_text: Genesis → Draw a spell. Discard a spell when this site is first attacked successfully.

name: Wolpertinger
type_text: An Elite Beast of tooth, claw, and horn
rules_text: Has +1 power for each of your dead Beasts.
flavour_text: Fur friends and family, we remember you.

name: Wormelow Tump
type_text: A Unique Site of a past not forgotten
rules_text: (E)(E)(E) – Opponents can't affect cards in your cemetery.

name: Wraetannis Titan
type_text: An Elite Giant makes an epic entrance
rules_text: Genesis → Strike each enemy here.
flavour_text: O valley low, innocent dove What grievous blows rain from above

name: Wrath of the Sea
type_text: Elite Magic of merciless deluge
rules_text: Flood all sites adjacent to a body of water this turn. Then submerge all minions and artifacts on water.

name: Wyvern
type_text: An Exceptional Beast, oft mistaken for a Dragon
rules_text: Airborne
flavour_text: Godric braced himself, assured that dragon-fire would give him a swift end. He was disappointed.

name: Year of the Blaze
type_text: A Unique Aura, hot pursu'd by fate
rules_text: At the start of your turn, destroy affected sites and everything here, including Year of the Blaze.

name: Yellow Knight
type_text: An Exceptional Mortal swears a noble vow
rules_text: Lance
flavour_text: Draped in golden regalia bedight with sunlit hues, the knight rode gallantly, the most chivalrous of champions.

name: Yokai Kappas
type_text: Elite Beasts imperil this pond
rules_text: Discard a water site → Untap Yokai Kappas. Use only once per turn.
flavour_text: In the cool winter months when cucurbits don't grow, kappas of the Yokai forest find other means of refreshment.

name: Yourke Crossbowmen
type_text: Exceptional Mortals entrenched and armed
rules_text: Ranged | Takes no damage from ranged strikes.
flavour_text: Corin's shield wracked and shivered like a plucked bowstring—but held!—while he reloaded.

name: Zephyranne Airship
type_text: Elite Mortals take to the skies
rules_text: Airborne, Movement +2 | May carry any number of allied minions.

name: Älvalinne Dryads
type_text: Ordinary Spirits of sweet succor
rules_text: Älvalinne Dryads provide ①.
flavour_text: How fair to greet, on misted morn A daint parade of dew-kissed bloom Now deep, inspire! A bliss reborn Of air faint lade with sweet perfume

name: Craig Sumison
type_text: Principal/Director/Sales Representative
rules_text: Tap → Play or draw a site. Tap → Draw a site.
flavour_text: Principal at Raine & Horne - Roxby Downs (RLA 208715) 24 years experience
